titleStmt.title: A survey of the county judicatures commonly called the county court, hundred court, and court baron wherein the nature and use of them, and the way and order of keeping them is opened for the great ease and profit of all such as have occasion to keep, or use them / by William Sheppard.
titleStmt.author: Sheppard, William, d. 1675?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by R. Daniel and are to be sold by Nathaniel Elkins ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard Law School Library.
